questions.question: What year was Korn's self-titled debut album released?
Which song was the first official single released from Korn's debut album?
Which famous rapper guested on the track "Children of the Korn" from "Follow the Leader"?
How many different album covers were initially available for Korn's "Issues" album upon its release?

options: The Devil Went Down to Georgia
questions.question: Which song from "Follow the Leader" is a cover of a famous country song?
On which song from their debut album does Jonathan Davis famously incorporate scatting and non-lyrical vocalizations?
What was Korn's very first music video for?
Who was the original drummer for Korn during the 90s?

options: Take a Look in the Mirror
See You on the Other Side
